text: okay we got nine nine nine nine nine
seven let's go over fresh August 24th
2018 the day I reached 1 million
followers on Facebook to go along with
300 million video views to think that I
got my first video camera 19 months ago
when Deanna bought me this cannon I
never in a million years thought I'd
reach this milestone but let me back up
a little bit and introduce myself to all
my new friends and tell you exactly how
I got here
step by step my name is Drew Pinsky I'm
27 years old from Scottsdale Arizona and
as you can probably guess I am addicted
to traveling I've been to a hundred and
forty countries since 2012 this place is
called the Omo Valley and I'm on a
mission to visit every country in the
world during my junior year of college
at Wisconsin I studied abroad in Prague
which instilled the travel bug inside me
after visiting 20 countries in Europe
that semester I knew I wanted to make a
career out of traveling so after
graduating I took a job as an English
teacher in South Korea where I lived for
two years and started my first travel
blog called the hungry partier I worked
day and night on it for two years
without making a penny but by the time I
left Seoul I was getting small sponsors
which reduced my travel costs so I
packed my bags and traveled I went on a
three-month solo trip to India in 2015
and at this exact moment as I sat on my
hotel balcony in jaisalmer I discovered
the potential of snapchat and ran with
it
the following year or so I was making a
full-time living from snapchat getting
sponsorships from brands like TripIt and
Lonely Planet I instagrammed and blogged
on the side and my Facebook and YouTube
pages were basically inactive in January
2017 Deana bought me a nice Canon EOS m3
and inspired me to make videos at the
same time snapchat was virtually
overtaken by insta stories overnight the
timing was perfect I made a video in
North Korea in April 2017 which had 10
million views and that was a pivotal
moment when I realized I needed to focus
on video plus I enjoy telling stories
through video much more than writing or
photos
it wasn't until nine months ago in
Antarctica when I decided to do daily
videos and Here I am now with a newly
upgraded camera creating travel content
every day my job is very tedious and
time-consuming and I'm a workaholic but
I loved every second of it and I
couldn't imagine doing anything else
it's all about staying consistent
focusing on telling unique stories with
a hook executing the filming and editing
and then committing to do it every
single day there is also a lot of
marketing that goes on behind the scenes
it's also been a test of patience now
I'm making a final push to reach my goal
of visiting every country which I have
53 left but my biggest goal is to keep
inspiring you to travel and follow your
dreams because if I did it as a regular
kid from Arizona why can't you do it too
it's achievable to anyone watching this
video if you're willing to put in the
long hours and have patience so that's
my story and I hope you enjoyed
listening from the bottom of my heart
thank you for watching my videos and
keep sending me all your messages and
comments you are the reason why I do
what I do
I'm drew pinsky and if you like my
travel videos please click Subscribe and
join me as I plan to visit every country
in the world
